00030 struct btDispatcherInfo
00031 {
00032         enum DispatchFunc
00033         {
00034                 DISPATCH_DISCRETE = 1,
00035                 DISPATCH_CONTINUOUS
00036         };
00037         btDispatcherInfo()
00038                 :m_timeStep(btScalar(0.)),
00039                 m_stepCount(0),
00040                 m_dispatchFunc(DISPATCH_DISCRETE),
00041                 m_timeOfImpact(btScalar(1.)),
00042                 m_useContinuous(true),
00043                 m_debugDraw(0),
00044                 m_enableSatConvex(false),
00045                 m_enableSPU(true),
00046                 m_useEpa(true),
00047                 m_allowedCcdPenetration(btScalar(0.04)),
00048                 m_useConvexConservativeDistanceUtil(false),
00049                 m_convexConservativeDistanceThreshold(0.0f)
00050         {
00051 
00052         }
00053         btScalar        m_timeStep;
00054         int                     m_stepCount;
00055         int                     m_dispatchFunc;
00056         mutable btScalar        m_timeOfImpact;
00057         bool            m_useContinuous;
00058         class btIDebugDraw*     m_debugDraw;
00059         bool            m_enableSatConvex;
00060         bool            m_enableSPU;
00061         bool            m_useEpa;
00062         btScalar        m_allowedCcdPenetration;
00063         bool            m_useConvexConservativeDistanceUtil;
00064         btScalar        m_convexConservativeDistanceThreshold;
00065 };

00067 enum ebtDispatcherQueryType
00068 {
00069         BT_CONTACT_POINT_ALGORITHMS = 1,
00070         BT_CLOSEST_POINT_ALGORITHMS = 2
00071 };

00075 class btDispatcher
00076 {
00077 
00078 
00079 public:
00080         virtual ~btDispatcher() ;
00081 
00082         virtual btCollisionAlgorithm* findAlgorithm(const btCollisionObjectWrapper* body0Wrap,const btCollisionObjectWrapper* body1Wrap,btPersistentManifold* sharedManifold, ebtDispatcherQueryType queryType) = 0;
00083 
00084         virtual btPersistentManifold*   getNewManifold(const btCollisionObject* b0,const btCollisionObject* b1)=0;
00085 
00086         virtual void releaseManifold(btPersistentManifold* manifold)=0;
00087 
00088         virtual void clearManifold(btPersistentManifold* manifold)=0;
00089 
00090         virtual bool    needsCollision(const btCollisionObject* body0,const btCollisionObject* body1) = 0;
00091 
00092         virtual bool    needsResponse(const btCollisionObject* body0,const btCollisionObject* body1)=0;
00093 
00094         virtual void    dispatchAllCollisionPairs(btOverlappingPairCache* pairCache,const btDispatcherInfo& dispatchInfo,btDispatcher* dispatcher)  =0;
00095 
00096         virtual int getNumManifolds() const = 0;
00097 
00098         virtual btPersistentManifold* getManifoldByIndexInternal(int index) = 0;
00099 
00100         virtual btPersistentManifold**  getInternalManifoldPointer() = 0;
00101 
00102         virtual btPoolAllocator*        getInternalManifoldPool() = 0;
00103 
00104         virtual const btPoolAllocator*  getInternalManifoldPool() const = 0;
00105 
00106         virtual void* allocateCollisionAlgorithm(int size)  = 0;
00107 
00108         virtual void freeCollisionAlgorithm(void* ptr) = 0;
00109 
00110 };
